name: phrase-api-reference
description: Phrase is a translation management platform for software projects. You can collaborate on language file translation with your team or order translations through our platform.

scripts.start: run-s lint bundle generate && echo "Clients library genrated, check clients directory."
scripts.generate.ruby: run-s lint bundle && openapi-generator generate -i tmp/compiled.yaml -g ruby -o clients/ruby -t ./openapi-generator/templates/ruby-client -c ./openapi-generator/ruby_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.go: run-s lint bundle && openapi-generator generate -i tmp/compiled.yaml -g go -o clients/go -t ./openapi-generator/templates/go -c ./openapi-generator/go_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.cli: run-s lint bundle && openapi-generator generate -i tmp/compiled.yaml -g go -o tmp/cli -t ./openapi-generator/templates/cli -c ./openapi-generator/cli_lang.yaml && cp tmp/cli/api_* clients/cli/cmd/ && cp tmp/cli/README.md clients/cli/
